content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Operation at (37.0, -85.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (37.0, -85.0) mining coal
- Wooden chest at (36.5, -86.5) storing coal

### Iron/Copper Mining and Smelting Complex at (-28.0, -61.0)
Large mining and smelting operation consisting of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0, -61.0) mining copper and iron ore
- Wooden chest at (-27.5, -59.5) storing iron and copper ore
- Stone furnace at (-27.0, -58.0) for smelting
- Burner inserter at (-26.5, -59.5) moving items from chest to furnace
- Burner inserter at (-25.5, -58.5) moving processed plates
- Wooden chest at (-24.5, -58.5) storing iron and copper plates
- Additional furnaces at (-23.0, -58.0), (-21.0, -58.0) with associated inserters
- Transport belt system connecting components

### Iron Mining Complex at (-10.0, -59.0)
Multiple mining drills working together:
- Burner mining drill at (-10.0, -59.0) mining iron ore
- Burner mining drill at (-8.0, -59.0) mining iron ore
- Burner mining drill at (-6.0, -59.0) mining iron ore
- Wooden chests at (-9.5, -57.5), (-7.5, -57.5), (-5.5, -57.5) storing iron ore
- Transport belt system connecting components
- Multiple burner inserters moving materials between components

### Smelting Array at (0.0, 0.0)
Large smelting operation consisting of:
- Four stone furnaces at (0.0, 0.0), (2.0, 0.0), (4.0, 0.0), (6.0, 0.0)
- Input chests at (0.5, -2.5), (2.5, -2.5), (4.5, -2.5), (6.5, -2.5)
- Output chests at (0.5, 2.5), (2.5, 2.5), (4.5, 2.5), (6.5, 2.5)
- Multiple burner inserters moving materials between components
- Transport belt system connecting the array

### Power Generation System at (4.5, 20.5)
Power plant consisting of:
- Steam engine at (4.5, 20.5)
- Boiler at (-1.5, 22.0)
- Offshore pump at (-3.5, 27.5)
- Pipe network connecting components
- Electric poles at (11.5, 20.5) and (7.5, 20.5)

ERROR TIPS

### Fuel Management Issues
- Multiple burner mining drills and inserters are out of fuel - Ensure regular fuel supply to all burner devices
- Implement a fuel distribution system to keep mining and inserting operations running

### Entity Placement Issues
- Inserters are waiting for space in destination - Ensure proper spacing and clearance for inserter drop locations
- Some inserters have no source/destination entities - Verify complete production chains with proper input/output connections

### Fluid System Issues
- Steam engine has no input liquid - Ensure proper pipe connections between boiler and steam engine
- Some pipe networks are empty - Verify fluid connections and pump operations

### Production Flow Issues
- Multiple furnaces show "no ingredients to smelt" - Verify input material supply chains
- Some inserters are waiting for source items - Check production line bottlenecks and material flow
